> <OLD>
>
> "Well itsd time to clean up this mess, even tought I tried to keep at
> minimun the damage still is work to be done, I also want a full knowledge of
> the base, alarm systems, Stocks of weapons and supplies and a full access to
> aqll systems" said Hydras whgile he kept an eye in his new minions

<NEW>

HELLSCREAM smiled and pointed at the base that was even now starting
to catch fire, "Well I think most of your answers are there." He said.

There was a nod from MAX-B, "Roger." He said.

DIRGEGUN stood with his arms folded over his chest, "What happened to
the big guy?"

THRUSTOR nodded, "I think he fell into the pits."

Whiping around to look at THRUSTOR and DIRGEGUN, "Of course he did,
that's why the base is on fire. You know what was in those pits don't
you?

DIRGEGUN and THRUSTOR nodded, "Yes, Angolmois energy  energy."

HELSCREAM nodded. "And now the base is going up in flames." Strangely
HELLSCREAm did not seem to be the slightest bit alarmed by these
events.

(TAG)

- Preston
